revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: For the embole of the eighth indiction from the village of Moirai, through Ioannes of the holding of Ieremias, thirty artabas of wheat by the sallarian (or solenikos?) measure, totals 30 artabas of wheat by the sallarian (or solenikos?) measure. Written on Epeiph 12, 8th indiction, by Viktor, who agrees to it.For the embole of the eighth indiction from the village of Moirai, through Ioannes of the holding of Ieremias, thirty artabas of wheat by the sallarian (or solenikos?) measure, totals 30 artabas of wheat by the sallarian (or solenikos?) measure. Written on Epeiph 12, 8th indiction, by Viktor, who agrees to it.

listBibl.bibl: P.Princ. II 93 P. J. Sijpesteijn, "Corrections on Some Princeton Papyri," ZPE 68 (1987): 143-148; BL III, 150; IX, 220
